Package sheep.input

Contains the input singletons and interfaces for listening to events generated by these singletons.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
KeyboardListener An interface for classes which want to subscribe for events on the keyboard.
TouchListener Objects can subscribe to touch events by implementing this interface.
 

Class Summary
Keyboard This singleton class tracks the state of the keyboard.
Touch This singleton class tracks the state of the touchscreen.
 

Package sheep.input Description

Contains the input singletons and interfaces for listening to events generated by these singletons.
